title: Create Twitter launch thread
description: Write and post a 9-tweet thread announcing Hlavi. Include screenshots, highlight key features, share the story behind building it, and ask for feedback. Use hashtags: #buildinpublic #indiehacker #productivity

acceptance_criteria.description: Draft 9-tweet thread covering problem, solution, features, tech stack
Post thread and engage with replies for 24 hours
Retweet with additional context at peak hours
